scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build  && cd _book && echo joshuamccall.com  > CNAME &&  git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs and examples' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs and examples' && git push https://github.com/joshmccall221/gitbook.git master --force && git push https://github.com/joshmccall221/gitbook.git gh-pages --force
scripts.docs:go: npm run docs:publish && git add . && git commit -am 'gitbook updates' && git push
